menu.item-veg-description: Soya chunks cooked in onion and tomato based thick gravy with lip smaking spices and flavours served with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: A Parsi dish with the combination of elements from Parsi and Gujrati community. Chicken, lentils and vegetables cooked together with freshly ground special spice mix served with rice + achar + side salad + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Raw jackfruit cooked to perfection in a caramalised onion, garlic and ginger paste with freshly ground garam masala served with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: Tender chicken pieces cooked in spicy flavourful lip smacking base of carmalised onion, garlic and chillies with tangy tamrind and yogurt mix topped with fresh corinader served with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: Baby potatoes roasted in a spice mix and cooked in a base of onion, tomato and yogurt gravy finished off with fresh herbs served with 2 parathas + siide salad + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: Lamb slow cooked in a thick onion-tomato based gravy with freshly ground spices topped with soft petals of onion and tomato served with 2 parathas + rice + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: Assorted mix veggies cooked in a creamy onion, tomato and cashew based thick gravy finished with freshly ground garam masala and herbs served with 2 parathas + rice + papad + side salad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: A fiery & spicy dish from the coastal regions of Maharashtra. Mackerel cooked in home made malvani spice mix with onion, tomato and coconut based gravy. Served with rice + side salad + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: Indian cottage cheese cooked in a creamy buttery thick gravy of onion, tomato and cashew slow cooked with aromatic basmati rice, fried onion, mint and corriander served with yogurt dip + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: A hearty, rich rice dish that's a favourite among Indians. Slow cooked chicken marinated in spices, fresh herbs, fried onions and yogurt; layered in rice and cooked on a slow flame to create the perfect dum biryani flavour. Served with yogurt dip + achar + papad.

menu.item-nonveg-name: Tawa anda pepper fry with pav
menu.item-nonveg-description: Hard boiled pan fried eggs in spicy tangy hot blend of sauces, stir fried in butter, onions, tomato served with 2 buns + pickled onions + Salad
Slow cooked chicken curry with pickling spices, dried red chillies in thick onion tomato based sauce served with 2 parathas + papad + salad.
A Goan delicacy with lip smacking flavours which is sweet, spicy and tangy that will give your  taste buds a ride served with  2 parathas+ side salad + papad

A Dish from the coastal regions of Maharashtra, Mussels cooked in a lip smacking and flavourful sauce of caramalised onion, coconut and fresh ground special spice mixes served with rice + papad+achar+ side salad
Spicy Slow cooked lamb curry  from the south of India with aromatic and fragnant spices and flavours topped with crispy fried garlic served with rice +papad + achar
Favourite Indo-Chinese dish made fried chicken cooked in flavourful chinese gravy with aromatic flavours served with aromatic fried rice made with chicken and assorted veggies n chinese spices
